import {Container, Row, Col} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {useSelector} from 'react-redux'; import React from 'react'; import Logout from './Logout'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../App.css'; const UserBanner = ()=>{ const {isLoggedIn, userData} = useSelector(state =>({ isLoggedIn: state.user.isLoggedIn, userData: state.user.payload })) return(
) if(!isLoggedIn || userData == null){ return(
로그인 / 회원가입
) } else{ console.log(userData) return(
오늘도 오셨군요! {userData.username}님! / 로그아웃
) } } export default UserBanner;
